Text: wot albums are there in this

How can i split the songs?
The noob who made this.... dident split them up.... so its like 1 big dvd with 1 track!
you can split it up with windows movie maker, very simple, just open the file and then at the end of every song use the "split" button...as easy as that. good luck dude!
Alternatively to split the files you might want to check out VirtualDub.
